project_id.description: The GCP project ID for the project containing the target BigQuery dataset.
project_id.title: Project ID

dataset_id.description: The dataset ID to search for tables and views. If you are only loading data from one dataset, setting this option could result in much faster schema discovery.
dataset_id.title: Default Dataset ID

credentials_json.description: The contents of your Service Account Key JSON file. See the docs for more information on how to obtain this key.
credentials_json.title: Credentials JSON

data_format.title: Data Format
data_format.description: You can choose one of the data format so that we deserialize data accordingly

sql_query.description: SQL Query for big query, This can be provided if we want to fetch selective data
sql_query.title: SQL Query

cursor_default_value.description: Default value for cursor field. Read will start from this cursor field
cursor_default_value.title: Default Cursor Field Value

fetch_rows_limit.description: Default value for number of rows that should be read in one query
fetch_rows_limit.title: Fetch Rows Limit

syncMode.title: Sync Mode
syncMode.description: You can choose if this connector will copy only the new or updated data, or all rows in the tables and columns you set up for replication, every time a sync is running

cursorField.title: Cursor Field
cursorField.description: Field that can be used to track the read progress.

cursorFieldFormat.title: Cursor Field Format
cursorFieldFormat.description: The format of cursor field if field value represents a timestamp.
